=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Rush Hour 1-3 Collection (3FE) (DVD) (Franchise Art)
Review Date: 2015/10/09
Store: Various  (Actor, Director)    Rated:    PG-13    Format: DVD
Categories: Movies & TV, Featured Categories, DVD, Action & Adventure
Product Description: ['Chan. Tucker. Their 3 smashin’, trash-talkin’ police-action comedy Rushes! One chops the chops. The other talks the talk. Jackie Chan and Chris Tucker bring fresh style and swagger to these smash-hit action-comedies. Rush Hour (Disc 1) has the pair learning – someway, anyway – to work together while tackling a kidnapping case in L.A. Rush Hour 2 (Disc 2/Side A) bullets the duo from Hong Kong to L.A. to Vegas on the trail of counterfeiters. And the fast, frenzied fun comes to Paris in Rush Hour 3 (Disc 2/Side B) when the cops pursue a Chinese crime boss. Kicky chemistry, punchy verbal wit and awesome stunts – Hour after Hour after Hour!']
Average Rating: 4.8
Product Details: {'Genre': 'Comedy, Action & Adventure', 'Format': 'Multiple Formats, Color, NTSC, Widescreen', 'Contributor': 'Various', 'Language': 'English', 'Runtime': '4 hours and 33 minutes', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'MPAA rating': 'PG-13 (Parents Strongly Cautioned)', 'Product Dimensions': '0.5 x 5.3 x 7.5 inches; 2.72 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'NEWL1000188889DVD', 'Director': 'Various', 'Media Format': 'Multiple Formats, Color, NTSC, Widescreen', 'Run time': '4 hours and 33 minutes', 'Release date': 'March 29, 2011', 'Actors': 'Various', 'Studio': 'WarnerBrothers', 'Number of discs': '2'}

Skin Trade [Blu-ray]
Dolph Lundgren  (Actor),     Tony Jaa  (Actor),     Ekachai Uekrongtham  (Director)    &                   0                  more   Rated:    R    Format: Blu-ray
Movies & TV, Blu-ray, Movies
['New Jersey cop Nick (Lundgren) heads to Thailand to track down Russian human-trafficking thugs who killed his family after he busts them in New York. Once in Thailand, he teams up with local cop, Tony (Jaa) as their road to retribution leads through high-speed chases and multiple confrontations uncovering corruption, pay-offs and personal vendettas.']

Five Stars
Ocean's Eleven (2001), Twelve & Thirteen Collection (3FE) (DVD) (Franchise Art)
Rated:    PG-13    Format: DVD
Movies & TV, Featured Categories, DVD, Action & Adventure
['Eleven. Twelve. Thirteen... Jackpot! Danny Ocean (George Clooney) and his elite crew of tricksters and thieves are back to back to back in these sleek, stylish thrillers directed by Steven Soderbergh. Ocean’s Eleven (Disc 1) kicks off the fun with a daring Las Vegas heist. The team doubles down and goes global to European glamour spots in Ocean’s Twelve (Disc 2/Side A). And Ocean’s Thirteen (Disc 2/Side B) has the group reuniting in Vegas for a dazzling scheme of payback against a double-crossing casino kingpin. Enough starpower to light up the Vegas Strip night joins Clooney. Are you in or out?']

**Updated User Profile Summary:**

- **Rating Tendencies:** The user maintains a strong preference for highly-rated offerings, as evidenced by their recent five-star review, elevating their average rating to 4.8. This indicates a consistent trend of satisfaction in their experiences.

- **Content Appreciation:** The user continues to showcase a strong affinity for audio-visual content, particularly in the action and adventure genres. Their latest acquisition emphasizes a preference for engaging narratives that blend humor with excitement.

- **Interest in Artists:** They exhibit a sustained interest in well-known contemporary talent, further enhancing their media enjoyment by choosing offerings featuring recognizable figures.

- **Production Quality:** The user prioritizes high-quality productions from reputable studios, consistently opting for collections that reflect polished artistry. Their recent purchase aligns perfectly with this preference for well-crafted entertainment.

- **Emphasis on Accessibility:** Accessibility remains a vital aspect of the user’s viewing habits, as they actively seek out titles that feature subtitles or closed captions to maximize engagement. Their latest acquisition notably included English subtitles, reaffirming their commitment to inclusive viewing experiences.

Overall, the user's discerning taste continues to reflect contemporary trends, favoring high-quality, enjoyable, and accessible media that consistently captivates and entertains.
